code: import{useEffect,useState}from'react';import Select from'react-select';import{StyledHeaderDivQuery}from'../../SharedComponents';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SelectTable=_ref=>{let{data,handleSelectTableChange,selectedTable}=_ref;const[values,setValues]=useState([]);const notToTake=["psw_reset_codes","it_chat_ids","access_logs","event_logger","salts","secrets"];useEffect(()=>{const filteredKeys=Object.keys(data).filter(key=>!notToTake.includes(key));setValues(filteredKeys.map(key=>({value:key,label:key})));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(StyledHeaderDivQuery,{className:"selector-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Seleziona la tabella dal men\xF9 a tendina"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Select,{options:values,isMulti:false,value:selectedTable,placeholder:"Seleziona la tabella che vorresti vedere...",onChange:handleSelectTableChange})]});};export default SelectTable;
